title: 73rd Independence Day Celebration falling on 04th February 2021
decision_details:
-The proposal made by the the Minister of Irrigation and State Minister of 	Internal Security, Home Affairs and Disaster Management to appoint the following Cabinet Sub-Committee to organize and monitor the activities of the 73rd Independence Day Celebration falling on 04th February 2021, was approved by the Cabinet.

    • Hon. Mahinda Rajapaksa
      Prime Minister - (Chairman)
      	
    • Hon. (Prof.) G.L. Peiris
      Minister of Education 
      
    • Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena
      Foreign Minister
      
    • Hon. Janaka Bandara Tennakoon
      Minister of Public Services, Provincial Councils & 
      Local Government
      
    • Hon. Keheliya Rambukwella
      Minister of Mass Media
      
    • Hon. Chamal Rajapaksa 
      Minister of Irrigation and State Minister of Internal Security, Home Affairs and Disaster Management
      
    • Hon. Dullas Alahapperuma 
      Minister of Power
      
    • Hon. Wasudeva Nanayakkara
      Minister of Water Supply
